Descriptions.2942048533:
Corruption is now permanent and deals {1}% increased damage.

Descriptions.1047323590:
Wither is now permanent and deals {1}% increased damage.

Duration reduced to {2} sec against players.

Descriptions.4101551753: Using Demonic Circle: Teleport or your Demonic Gateway reduces all damage you take by {1}% for {2} sec.

Descriptions.950143210: Drain Life heals for {1}% of the amount drained over {2} sec.

Descriptions.2961414238:
Inflicts increasing agony on the target, causing up to {1} Shadow damage over {2} sec. Damage starts low and increases over the duration. Refreshing Agony maintains its current damage level.

{FFFFFFFF|Agony damage sometimes generates {3} Soul Shard.}
Descriptions.1863122312: Agony may now ramp up to {1} stacks.

Descriptions.2665672042:
Your next Curse of Exhaustion, Curse of Tongues or Curse of Weakness cast within {1} sec is amplified.

Curse of Exhaustion
Reduces the target's movement speed by an additional {2}%.

Curse of Tongues
Increases casting time by an additional {3}%.

Curse of Weakness
Enemy is unable to critically strike.

Descriptions.812418970: Your Felguard deals {1}% more damage and takes {2}% less damage.

Descriptions.1708363367: Your Felguard deals {1}% additional damage. Soul Strike now deals {2}% of its damage to nearby enemies.

Descriptions.1880717998: Chaos Bolt, Shadowburn, and Incinerate deal {1}% increased damage to targets afflicted by Wither.

|T135793:24|t Summon Overfiend
Generates {2} Soul Shard Fragment every {3} sec and casts Chaos Bolt at {4}% effectiveness at its summoner's target.

Descriptions.743739596: Conflagrate reduces the cast time of your next Incinerate, Chaos Bolt, or Soul Fire by {1}%. Maximum {2} charges.

Descriptions.938012007:
Increases your critical strike chance by {1}%.

Physical attacks against you have a {2}% chance to make your next Incinerate instant cast. This effect can only occur once every {3}ldown sec.

Descriptions.3999775216: Your single target spells have a {1}% chance to curse the ground with a demonic bane, causing all of your single target spells to also strike targets marked with the bane for  {2}% of the damage dealt. Lasts {3} sec.

Replaces Havoc.

Replaces Havoc.

Your single target spells have a {1}% chance to curse the ground with a demonic bane, causing all of your single target spells to also strike targets marked with the bane for  {2}% of the damage dealt. Lasts {3} sec.

Descriptions.4150865413: Banishes an enemy Demon, Aberration, or Elemental, preventing any action for {1} sec. Limit {2}. Casting Banish again on the target will cancel the effect.
Descriptions.710906239: Banishes an enemy Demon, Aberration, Undead, or Elemental, preventing any action for {1} sec. Limit {2}. Casting Banish again on the target will cancel the effect.

Descriptions.3319191896: Tear open a portal to the nether above the target location, from which several Bilescourge will pour out of and crash into the ground over {1} sec, dealing {2} Shadow damage to all enemies within {3} yards.

Descriptions.3052128243: Encircle enemy players with Bonds of Fel. If any affected player leaves the {1} yd radius they explode, dealing {2} Fire damage split amongst all nearby enemies.

Descriptions.1059953555:
Chaos Bolt and Rain of Fire increase the damage of your next {1} Incinerates by {2}%. Shadowburn increases the damage of your next Incinerate by {3}%.

Stacks up to {4} times.

Descriptions.2454748695: Increases your movement speed by {1}%, but also damages you for {2}% of your maximum health every {3} sec. Movement impairing effects may not reduce you below {4}% of normal movement speed. Lasts {5} sec.

Descriptions.3950242694: Summons {1} ferocious Dreadstalkers to attack the target for {2} sec.

Descriptions.945566993: Summon a fel lord to guard the location for {1} sec. Any enemy that comes within {2} yards will suffer {3} Physical damage, and players struck will be stunned for {4} sec.

Descriptions.517673555:
Summons a demonic Observer to keep a watchful eye over the area for {1} sec.

Anytime an enemy within {2} yards casts a harmful magical spell, the Observer will deal up to {3}% of the target's maximum health in Shadow damage.

Descriptions.1720344248: Your Dreadstalkers' attacks have a {1}% chance to trigger an additional Dreadbite.

Descriptions.1575158382: Calls forth a cataclysm at the target location, dealing {1} Shadowflame damage to all enemies within {2} yards and afflicting them with Immolate.
Descriptions.3479079165: Calls forth a cataclysm at the target location, dealing {1} Shadowflame damage to all enemies within {2} yards and afflicting them with Wither.

Descriptions.570811739: Launches {1} bolts of felfire over {2} sec at random targets afflicted by your Immolate within {3} yds. Each bolt deals {4} Fire damage to the target and {5} Fire damage to nearby enemies.
Descriptions.3770287873: Launches {1} bolts of felfire over {2} sec at random targets afflicted by your Wither within {3} yds. Each bolt deals {4} Fire damage to the target and {5} Fire damage to nearby enemies.

Descriptions.2382836120: Unleashes a devastating blast of chaos, dealing a critical strike for {1} Chaos damage. Damage is further increased by your critical strike chance.

Descriptions.1861047160: Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, and Shadowburn always gain at least {1}% of the maximum benefit from your Mastery: Chaotic Energies.

|T237560:24|t Demonic Circle: Teleport

Descriptions.3949458342: Increases you and your pets' maximum health by {1}%.

Descriptions.2023386643: Reduces the damage dealt by Burning Rush by {1}%. Burning Rush increases your movement speed by an additional {2}%.

Descriptions.80168848: You passively summon a Wild Imp to fight for you every {1} sec.

Descriptions.1338082550: Increases the damage of Haunt by {1}% and reduces its cast time by {2}%. Haunt now applies Shadow Embrace.

Descriptions.2279340369: Critical strikes from your Agony, Corruption, and Unstable Affliction have a chance to grant Nightfall.
Descriptions.1610573314: Critical strikes from your Agony, Wither, and Unstable Affliction have a chance to grant Nightfall.

Descriptions.2024788798: Increases the damage of Shadowburn by {1}%. The critical strike chance of Shadowburn is increased by an additional {2}% when damaging a target that is at or below {3}% health.

Descriptions.3014121681: Increases Malefic Rapture damage by {1}% and reduces its cast time by {2}%.

Descriptions.3960489958:
Unleashing your demonic soul bestows a fiendish entity unto the soul of its targets, dealing {1} Shadow damage over {2} sec.

If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Soul Anathema.

Descriptions.3451324296: Enemies damaged by your Overlord have their souls cloven, increasing damage taken by you and your pets by {1}% for {2} sec.

Descriptions.1509543072:
Mother of Chaos empowers your next Incinerate to become Infernal Bolt.

|T841220:24|t Infernal Bolt
Hurl a bolt enveloped in the infernal flames of the abyss, dealing {1} Fire damage to your enemy target and generating {2} Soul Shards.
Descriptions.272458946:
Mother of Chaos empowers your next Shadow Bolt to become Infernal Bolt.

|T841220:24|t Infernal Bolt
Hurl a bolt enveloped in the infernal flames of the abyss, dealing {1} Fire damage to your enemy target and generating {2} Soul Shards.

Descriptions.1631582120: Demonic Art increases the damage of your next Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, or Shadowburn by {1}% and reduces its cast time by {2}%.
Descriptions.55779947: Demonic Art increases the damage of your next Hand of Gul'dan by {1}% and reduces its cast time by {2}%.

Descriptions.33794351:
Increases Drain Life healing by {1}% while your health is at or below {2}% health. 

Damage done by your Agony, Corruption, Unstable Affliction, and Malefic Rapture is increased by {3}% when your target is at or below {4}% health.
Descriptions.3863976114:
Increases Drain Life healing by {1}% while your health is at or below {2}% health. 

Damage done by your Agony, Wither, Unstable Affliction, and Malefic Rapture is increased by {3}% when your target is at or below {4}% health.

Descriptions.4203076518:
Wither damage increased by {1}%.

Blackened Soul deals {2}% increased damage per stack of Wither.
Descriptions.2009186724:
Agony damage increased by {1}%.

Blackened Soul deals {2}% increased damage per stack of Wither.

Descriptions.334300076: Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by {1}% and reduces the cast time of your Incinerate spell by {2}%.

Descriptions.153478707: Bolts from Dimensional Rift now deal {1}% of damage dealt to nearby enemies as Fire damage.

Descriptions.1553950197:
Healthstones you conjure for yourself are now Demonic Healthstones and can be used multiple times in combat. Demonic Healthstones cannot be traded.

|T538744:24|t Demonic Healthstone
Instantly restores {1}% health. {2} sec cooldown.
Descriptions.1362751949:
Healthstones you conjure for yourself are now Demonic Healthstones and can be used multiple times in combat. Demonic Healthstones cannot be traded.

|T538744:24|t Demonic Healthstone
Instantly restores {1}% health, plus an additional {2}% over {3} sec. {4} sec cooldown.

Descriptions.1516305162: Incinerate has a chance to tear open a Dimensional Rift or recharge Dimensional Rift if learned.

Descriptions.2413956643: Increases the damage of Channel Demonfire by {1}% and it deals damage {2}% faster.

Descriptions.3860309387:
Increases all damage done by your pet by {1}%.

Reduces the cast time of Shadow Bolt by {2}% and increases its damage by {3}%.

Descriptions.1487602528: Targets resurrected with Soulstone resurrect with {1}% additional health and {2}% additional mana.

Descriptions.116874616: Increases the damage of Doom by {1}% and Doom summons {2} Wild Imp when it expires.

Descriptions.847038111: Your Soul Shards now float above your head.

Descriptions.2938894264: Your Soul Shards have been touched by fel energy.

Descriptions.1940362799:
Casting Soul Rot grants {1} applications of Malign Omen.

|T136131:24|t Malign Omen
Your next Malefic Rapture deals {2}% increased damage and extends the duration of your damage over time effects and Haunt by {3} sec.

Descriptions.2213904024: Malefic Rapture damage is increased by {1}% for each enemy it hits, up to {2} enemies.

Descriptions.263706401:
Dark magic erupts from you and corrupts your soul for {1} sec, causing enemies suffering from your Wither to take {2} Shadowflame damage and increase its stack count by {3}.

While corrupted your Haste is increased by {4}% and spending Soul Shards on damaging spells grants {5} additional stack of Wither.

Descriptions.1373142373: Howl of Terror cooldown is reduced by {1} sec and range is increased by {2} yds.

Descriptions.2701492947: Dreadbite causes the target to take {1}% additional Shadowflame damage from your spell and abilities for the next {2} sec.
